tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
It is so important to feel comfortable and trust in your doctor especially during your first pregnancy. The first time I met Dr. Sadhna Singhal, I felt I am in good hands. She was so professional and caring. She always follow up with the progress , always have time to explain everything I asks and to hear me . Anytime I call, I'm always met with a friendly and helpful voice. I rarely have to wait a long time to be seen and the nurses are really kind. 
She was our doctor with our first child. With Dr. Sadhna Singhal We always feel at ease.

My experience overall I must say was excellent. Dr. Sadhna Singhal and her staff as always were pleasant and efficient. She always is concerned and helpful with my overall medical health.

Dr. Sadhna Singhal is not only extremely professional but she also was patient, kind, ************* *** ********* I never felt rushed or judged or brushed off. She listened to all of my concerns. Asked appropriate follow up questions and recommended the appropriate plan of treatment. I would strongly recommend Dr. Sadhna Singhal to all my friends and family.
reply_text: Thank you for such kind words. I am very pleased to have assisted you. The journey of your pregnancy was really wonderful, i hope you had a wonderful experience.

review:
If you are an unmarried woman who believes in reproductive rights and liberty, please do not visit this doctor ** *** ** *** **** ********** ************* * **** **** **** I was diagnosed with ectopic pregnancy and she literally blamed me for being pregnant at such a young age. Legit created a panic situation where if I didn't get operated, I'd die, without actually explaining to me what was actually going on!! *** ******** * **** ** **** ** ******** *** compelled me to talk to my parents..... She literally said that I deserved a slap from my parents for the thing that I did!
